"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Resting on Volganis Island, Aina talks about how she's been reading through Manon's daily logs. In particular, she's been focusing on the parts about enemies. She's found Manon's records of her thoughts and actions during battle useful as a model for her own fighting style."
